definitions: a person who purchases goods and services for personal use

examples.text: understanding what motivates consumers is more crucial than ever

shortDefinitions: person who purchases goods and services

definitions: a person or thing that eats or uses something

examples.text: Scandinavians are the largest consumers of rye

shortDefinitions: person or thing that eats or uses something

definitions: an organism that derives the organic compounds and energy it needs from the consumption of other organisms; a heterotroph

examples.text: consumers can't make their own food, so they have to consume other organisms for energy

shortDefinitions: organism that derives organic compounds from consumption of other organisms
